hero.title: VetGenius
hero.subtitle: AI-Powered Veterinary Assistant
hero.tagline: Supporting veterinarians with intelligent diagnostic assistance for better animal care

about.title: A Revolution in Veterinary Medicine
about.paragraph1: VetGenius.ai combines advanced artificial intelligence with comprehensive veterinary knowledge to support animal health professionals in their daily practice. In collaboration with leading veterinary universities, we are developing a platform that combines the latest scientific insights with practical experience to improve the quality of animal care worldwide.
about.paragraph2: We strive to give every veterinarian access to the most advanced diagnostic tools. By combining complex data analysis with proven veterinary knowledge, we help veterinarians make faster and more accurate diagnoses, ultimately leading to better health outcomes for animals.

multimodal.title: Multimodal Diagnostics
multimodal.description: Analyze X-rays, ultrasounds, blood tests and voice notes in one integrated platform.
